creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
medium: Silk braid, bamboo, silk gauze, and glass
object_name: Summer Court Hat for a Third Rank Civil Official
text: The summer or "cool hat" consisted of a conical framework of split bamboo with a taut silk covering and brocade rim. Red, unspun silk floss, or red silk braided tassels were used to decorate the crown. The transparent blue glass "jewel" is indication of a third rank civil official.
title: Summer Court Hat for a Third Rank Civil Official
